Metadata.title: Fin
Metadata.description: Personal finance management application. Track expenses, manage budgets, and monitor currency exchange rates in real-time.
Metadata.keywords: personal finance, expense tracker, budget management, currency exchange, USD rate, USDT rate, bolivares, financial planning
